DataElement.preferredName: Bowel Patient Other Problem Assessment Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether the quality of life evaluation of an individual to evaluate the function of the digestive tract with regard to other problems or symptoms of increase in occurrences of passing stool from the rectum.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the quality of life evaluation of an individual to evaluate the function of the digestive tract with regard to other problems or symptoms of increase in occurrences of passing stool from the rectum.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (in-TES-tin) The long, tube-shaped organ in the abdomen that completes the process of digestion. There is both a large intestine and a small intestine. Also called the bowel.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: The portion of the gastrointestinal tract between the stomach and the anus. It includes the small intestine and large intestine.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Do you have any other problem
ReferenceDocuments.description: Do you have any other problems or comments you would like to make about your bowel function over the past week

DataElement.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form
